works.complaint:
The Content of the blog is unlawful and defamatory  
statement from an Ex Employee that been sacked for discipline and ethics  

practice. He is waging a war of slander against the business ( Reevethorpe
 
new Malden) which not fair as these not true about us. It is a shame we  
used to like google as the best search engine but since we found it very  

difficult to ask for the removal of this slander and defamation blog per  

google claim it must be from a court order and to do that in the USA it  
will cost the business a lot of money in times we all struggle to make a  

living.
As you can see in the contents of the blog this person depicting me as the
 
infamous terrorist leader of Al-Qaida Bin laden (NASSER BIN EL-TAIRY see  

blog contents below). Therefore I ask you please to remove this hurtful
and  
racist contents from your search engine and blog against us. I'm happy to 

co-operate in the matter where appropriate.
Looking forward to hearing from you,
Nasser El-Tairy
